description: This file is a PHP source script that manages the web interface for configuring RIP routing protocol settings. It includes HTML, JavaScript, and PHP code to display and process routing configurations, including interface selection, version settings, update interval, authentication options, and neighbor IP input.

methods.name: initPopulate
methods.description: Initializes form fields with values from the jsRIPEntry object.

methods.name: initEventHandler
methods.description: Sets up event handlers for authentication type selection, enabling or disabling relevant input fields.

methods.name: saveRIP
methods.description: Sends the configured RIP information via AJAX to update the device configuration on the server.
